exceptions.tactic: intros f a b k If H.
intros f' a b k If H.
intros f' a' b k If H.
intros f' a' b' k If H.
apply filterlim_locally_unique with (scal k (sign (b - a) * (b - a))); [apply filterlim_scal_r | apply filterlim_locally with (fun ptd => scal k (Riemann_sum f ptd))].
exceptions.exn: The reference k was not found in the current environment.

original: intros f a b k If H. apply filterlim_locally_unique with (scal k (sign (b - a) * (b - a))); [apply filterlim_scal_r | apply filterlim_locally with (fun ptd => scal k (Riemann_sum f ptd))]. intros eps.
